name: Fire Balls (Slowly Smiles, trans12)
description:
This is a game where you shoot fire balls at each other.

Originally Made for Forge Jam IX by Josh Soran and W. Cameron Perrin. We used UNET for online connectivity and plan on leading this into a new game for our school's senior thesis.

The current version is for Forge Jam IX and was released on May 31, 2020.

If you plan on player with your friends, port forward port 7777.
